product_name: Continental X-King Bike Tire - 26 x 2.2 / 26 x 2.4
long_description: Continental X-King mountain bike tire supplies solid cross-country performance with low rolling resistance and confident grip on a variety of trail conditions. Tread is optimized to balance fast-rolling and cornering performance, all while delivering good self-cleaning properties. 84 tpi casing with steel wire bead.
short_description: Continental X-King mountain bike tire supplies solid cross-country performance with low rolling resistance and confident grip on a variety of trail conditions.
